Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The interface implemented by valuators and components which display or select a value from a bounded range of values.
Docs.remarks: should be implemented for components which either display a value from a bounded range, or which allow the user to specify a value from a bounded range, or both. For instance, most sliders and range controls, as well as dials, should have representations which implement on the component's behalf. s may be read-only, in which case attempts to alter the value return to indicate failure.

Docs.summary: Sets the value of this object.
Docs.param: an object of type which is the desired new accessible value.
Docs.returns: if new value is successfully set, otherwise .

Docs.summary: Gets the minimum value of this object.
Docs.param: an object of type representing the minimum accessible value

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum value of this object.
Docs.param: an object of type representing the maximum accessible value

Docs.summary: Gets the value of this object.
Docs.value: a representing the current accessible value.
